data_table.description: Survival File and Follow-up for Atrial Fibrillation and Atrial Flutter Events, Original, Offspring, Generation 3, New Offspring Spouse, Omni 1, and Omni 2 (all cohorts) through 2014. This dataset contains validated endpoints information and should be used in conjunction with the corresponding AF file - in this case dataset vr_afcum_2015_a_1008s.

variable.name: idtype
variable.comment: IDTYPE and ID taken together form a unique study participant identification number.

variable.name: afx
variable.comment: This status refers to the initial case of AF for each participant.

variable.name: afxdate
variable.description: Date of atrial fibrillation/atrial flutter status
variable.comment: This date corresponds to the date the participant had their initial AF or the date of censoring (last known date the participant did not have AF). Refer to the protocol for explanation as to how the censoring date was calculated. Date includes month, day and year, however, coding manual displays only month and year to preserve confidentiality.
